name: GarrisonHero!: uGu's Reversal!
description:
GarrisonHero!: uGu's Reversal is a Reverse Tower Defense Game made for Snappy Guru's Game Jam with a Theme: Roles Reversed.

Controls:

WASD - rotate camera

PL:" - move camera point (u can also use the minimap)

MouseLeftButton - Interact with UI and Interactive Objects

For BONUS LEVEL (ARCHER DEMO)

- ARROW KEYS (MOVE ARCHER / Bonus Demo Mode ONLY)

- Z to attack

Most Assets were made during the Jam

Game production will continue after Snappy Guru's Game Jam.. following the Story of Archer in a Character Controlled Tower Defense Game.

I hope you enjoy the game, I find very cute and interesting

peace

-ayugu
